paper_abstract: Recently, Haase, Ouaknine, and Worrell have shown that reachability in two-clock timed automata is log-space equivalent to reachability in bounded one-counter automata. We show that reachability in bounded one-counter automata is PSPACE-complete. (C) 2014 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Reachability in two-clock timed automata is PSPACE-complete
